mapper.select: select ir.id,ir.hit_id,ir.patient_card_id,ir.hir_date as date,p.name as patientName,d.name as doctorName, ir.doctor_id,ir.remark,it.name as hitName,ir.status,p.sex,p.birthday,p.tel from inspect_items as it join inspect_record as ir on ir.hit_id=it.id join doctor as d on d.id=ir.doctor_id join patient_user_info_card as p on p.id=ir.patient_card_id where 1=1 and ir.status=#{status}
mapper.update: update inspect_record set status=2 where id=#{recordId}
mapper.select: select ire.remark,ire.checkinfo,it.name,i.id from inspect_record as i join inspect_result as ire on ire.hit_record_id=i.id join inspect_items as it on it.id=i.hit_id where i.patient_card_id=#{patientCardId}

select ir.id,ir.hir_date as date,it.name as hitName, p.name as patientName from inspect_record as ir join inspect_items as it on it.id=ir.hit_id join patient_user_info_card as p on ir.patient_card_id=p.id where p.user_id=#{userId}

select ire.remark,ire.checkinfo,it.name,i.hir_date as date from inspect_record as i join inspect_result as ire on ire.hit_record_id=i.id join inspect_items as it on it.id=i.hit_id where i.id=#{recordId}
